reviews.review: Win.

P0RTAL was a very short game. Sure, it supplies very few levels, but those levels are all very fun. Sometimes, something in this game will irritate you or seem impossible. At those times, you've just got to remember that this game is about making the impossible... possible. Filled with dark humor, tricky puzzles, mysterious areas, and many objects to help / hurt you on your way to the next test, this game is the best.
A must-play game.It's very unique and highly polished.

Valve does it AGAIN! Portals is filled with puzzles and action! Push your mind to its limits and find your way out of this maze! Portals is in my top 5 fav. games! Play Portals! Valve never lets there fans down!
If you haven't played this yet, you are missing out on way more than cake jokes. Get with it, plebs.

I beat this game in the first 2 and a half hours that i played it. I just didn't want to stop playing. The game's progression, in my opinion, is perfect. A lot of the portal usage was really fun. Trampolining around a large room was especially fun. The polish of the game is also exceptional. The really great humor was just icing on an already delicious cake.
Hey guys this game is really cool and *spoiler* the cake is a lie!
Bastante original e inovador un poco corto y los mapas no son tan dificiles como parecen ser tiene retos lo que aumenta la duracion del juego 100% recomendado

ummmm.....

do it for the cake....
Just awesome!
Bestes Puzzlespiel. Ever.
excellent PFS puzzler game.

very nice puzzles.
btw the cake is a lie.
A short and brilliantly written puzzler with a dark sense of humour. Every gamer owes it to themselves to play this.
Best computer game I've played so far.  Fun, challenging, and funny.
Atmospheric and inventive game with original gameplay and plot. It has this unexplainable factor X which drive you to play just few more minutes again and again.
So simple, yet so satisfying.
What can I say? The dialogue is great, the puzzles are engaging, and the portal mechanic allows one to think in several dimensions. Somewhat short, but worth every moment.

The guys from Old Man Murry wrote the script for a video game that consists entirely of first person jumping puzzles over pits of acid . A crate is one of the main characters.  It's fantastic.  The world is a strange place indeed.

Cubes and turrets.
Cake sold separately.
немного щикотка мозга
The cake IS a lie...I was shocked...

A classic.  Fantastic.  The best, most original (possibly *the* original) First-Person Perspective puzzle (no shooting) game ever.  Cannot be recommended highly enough - for its engaging plot, puzzles, and cake.
totes
"This was a triumph". Valve after the game was released.
Best first person puzzler ever.

Portal is a great single-player puzzle game. With the AI voice-over watching your every move, you really feel as if you yourself are in the simulation. It would be better if it were multiplayer, but hey, that's no reason not to get it. Let's hope you're "still alive" at the end of the game to hear the amazing song.
P0rtal ist einfach awesome! =)

Cuz... it`s Portal!

It's a great 3d puzzle game where you have to find a way out of puzzling rooms, using a device that creates portals on walls.
名作。無料DL期間に入手。プレイ時間は5時間程度でクリア出来ました。Half-Life 2と似たような操作で、「ポータルガン」を用いたワープで解いていくパズル形式の脱出ゲー型FPS。かなりオススメですが、ある程度視点の移動も激しい場面もあるため、FPS酔いをしやすい人は要注意。来年には2が出るということなので、気になった方はThe Orange Box辺りで是非。
GET IT
So good. I wanna have this game's babies. Funny and original and tells one of the best stories in any game.
I love the way Valve do it. It is a Great "think out of the box" training..
If you don't own this game yet... BUY IT TODAY!  One of the most fun and innovative games of the DECADE!

As part of a required test protocol, the enrichment centre is required to remind you that Portal won over 5 million awards including most awesome and sexy villain ever in a videogame. Completion of the game may even result in cake.
As part of a required test protocol, the enrichment centre is required to remind you that not owning Portal may result in loss of friends, an overwhelming feeling of inferiority or inadequacy and finally, death.
Thank you for taking the time to read this (insert subject name here).

This game was the first game that started my experience on Steam. For those who aren't used to the "AWSD" controller on keyboard, this is a good start. Pretty much a Puzzle/Action type game where you place certain "Portals" and must make the right movements in order to get it right. It may seem boring at first, but the story and revelation of "Aperture Science" evolves, and even the challenges increase. A good game that can get you addicted easily...or a game just to past the time.^_^
Оригинальная игра, будет интересна любителям головоломок. Великолепный саундтрек с гениальной финальной песней Still Alive
斬新なパズルゲー。MOD もあるし結構遊べる。まぁまぁ面白い。
One of the simplest but most beautiful design ideas that has coming to gaming in decades.
Buy it and you shall recieve cake.

Portal was a ground breaking run away success, and with good reason. Not only does it introduce a new way to interact with your environment from a first person perspective, it has amazingly witty dialog during its entire 3 to 4 hour long campaign. That may seem short, but it lasts just the right amount of time: long enough to captivate you and just short enough that you can finish it before you realize that you should have gone to bed 2 hours earlier.
Everyone should play Portal. A landmark game, no doubt.

スコア：92 / ジャンル：アクション / 難易度：高 / パズル：有

一人称視点で進めるアクションパズルゲーム。青色とオレンジ色のポータルというゲートを、ポータルを貼り付けられる壁・天井・床などに出して攻略して行く。メインストーリー部分はパズルとしては簡単な部類で、殆どの人が根気さえあればクリアできると思う。アクションとパズルが好きな人たちには難易度の高くなっている上級マップと、最短クリアタイム、最少ポータル数、最少歩数に挑むチャレンジモードもある。チャレンジモードはかなりやり込まないとゴールドを取るのが難しい。斬新な作品なのでお勧めしておきます。

Quite a good game with an original(ish) concept and solid gameplay, although for most it is considered to have weak replay value.

"Speedy thing goes in, speedy thing comes out."
When I am old and senile going on demented, I won't be able to remember the faces of my children, my victims, or my children's victims. But park me infront of this and I'll do it in under an hour.
Cool!!
THE CAKE IS A LIE! Bet you aren't sick of hearing that already :P Theres a reason why everyone repeated that to death. Get the game to find out why :D (hint: it's cause the game is awesome).
If you want a good puzzle, then choose this game.
Úžasná hra, jedna z nejlepších co znám !
Physics at its finest.
El Género Puzzle redefinido desde un punto de vista jamás antes explotado. Un juego de corta duración con un Gameplay único que tienes qué experimentar. Sin lugar a dudas un "Must-try".

Along with Braid, another one of the most innovative games of the 21st century (though it has been a short century yet). The characters, gameplay, and story are unforgettable. The puzzles provide quite an enjoyable challenge as well.

Portal is one of those games when you don't need to shoot the hell out of someone to have fun, puzzles and a great storyline can replace that. Portal 2 is coming out and i going to get it to see the storyline and great new gameplay. I Recommend Portal because it is a Great game for a low price and if you really get in to it there is Portal 2 coming out in 2011 Hopfully.

-Adobegeek
you suck if you don't play this

Ive played this through almost 3 times now. total play time almost 7 hours. and That includes the equally long Portal Prelude map pack. this doesnt mean this is at all a dissapointment of a game. the 3 hours of great puzzle gaming have yet to be matched  in my opinion. this is one game you shouldnt pass up.

9/10
Another great game by Valve :D

AWESOME is little to define this game, or better, piece of art. Portal is one of the most creative and intelligent games out now, and altought a bit short, delivers one of the most remarkable expierences in any game ever. A true must own.

Vegyétek megfele, főleg az aki volt olyan szerencsétlen, hogy az ingyen héten nem töltötte le. Nagyon jó játék, néhány hónap múlva meg jön a Portal 2, úgyhogy majd azt is irány surány megvenni, aztán majd aki akarja az tolhatja velem co-op-ba oszt jaú lesz.

Portal is by far one of the best video games of all time. The developers took a relatively obvious idea that few games had ever implemented, and they implemented it perfectly. Also, after beating the main story, I recommend the Portal TFV Map Pack at http://portalmaps.wecreatestuff.com/ .
Puzzles + First Person = WIN!
A bizarre puzzle game.
Serio? Se vc não jogou portal ainda é porque não é um Gamer de verdade. O Jogo NASCEU um Classico. E é um dos melhores de todos os tempos.
Portal is a great game for challenges, especially cake! Go get it if you don't have it!
Una pequeña joya si te gustan los juegos de puzzles :).
Classic
Holes: The Game.

Portal is a great example of how to build a game around teaching and refining a single mechanic. With expertly crafted puzzles and one of the most well developed villians in all of gaming, Portal is a unique and incredible experiences for any gamer.
Mind-fuck with a twist.
Awesome.  Play it.  Love it.
Fantastic puzzle game and story.
BUY THIS NOW!

If you enjoy puzzle games and first-person shooters, this is a great blend of both. The only drawback for me was the storyline was a minor let-down. It leaves questions that will perhaps be answered in the sequel. All in all, it's fun for a playthrough or two.
A very orginal puzzle FPS. This game will have you thinking quite a bit, but will continue to keep you interested through all of the puzzles.
One of the best games I've ever played; it's fun, witty, and mind-sharpening.
Never thought that logical games could be so much fun.
A modern classic. I would be doing this game an injustice if I called it anything besides perfect. Proves the continued longevity of PC gaming.
Best portal-creating FPS
Genius
Listen just buy it, short of wild sex its the best three hours you can have.
Does anyone even need convincing to play this? If you haven't played it yet, there's something significantly wrong with you.
Le FPS le plus bizzare du monde entier. Et celui qui à le meilleur humoire noire.
Whos says you cant like some one/thing just cuz there short?
This is only the BESTEST IN THE ENTIRE WORLD of puzzle games! AND YOU KNOW YOU LIKE PUZZLE GAMES!....and if you don't.... then I don't know why we're friends :D
Short, but absolutely worth it even at full price.  Fantastic dark humor and totally fun puzzle mechanics.

If you don't own Portal, you should.  I really don't like first-person shooters, so I was nervous about trying it, but I am so glad I did.  The game seamlessly teaches you increasingly creative ways to achieve your objectives in a way that is pretty magical.  The characters are amazing, and so so so funny.  You will laugh a lot as you play.  Portal is one of the best-designed games out there.
Mto bom esse jogo!!
Do I really need to tell you why you should play Portal? It has portals. It has cake. Just play it already.

Portal is a third-person adventure game built on Valve's Steam engine.  In addition to the character you control, you are guided through the game by the GLaDOS AI, who has some hilarious Passive-Aggressive dialog.

Seriously, play this game if just for GLaDOS's dialog.
You solve puzzles with Portals.  Honestly, if you don't have this yet, shame on you.  Go and buy the Orange Box right now.
Jogo fantástico. Sou tão fã que escrevi uma história inspirada nele e publiquei via [url=http://store.kobobooks.com/en-us/books/cobaia-e-portais]Kobo[/url].
juegazo puzles 3d, y mucho mucho humor buena manera de practicar tu vision espacial
Fun, exciting, and innovative. Everyone should play this once. (A)
Awesome.
Best Game ever :)
Best puzzle game out there, now with added ARG!

One of the most unique puzzle games out there. Even if you just go through and complete the game, you can still have fun just endlessly jumping through portals you created. The story is simple, yet involving. No puzzle is so hard that you get stuck for hours, but requires still hard enough you have to take a moment to think about it.

It's PORTAL! If you don't have this game yet, you never will. 

Go get it anyways.
